EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF & vCloudAir_Q414.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Supercharge Your Application Delivery Webinar is Tomorrow, 10/28
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We're sending you a friendly reminder of your registration for tomorrow's webinar "Supercharge Your Application Delivery with Pivotal and VMware " on Tuesday, October 28, 2014 at 10:00 AM PDT. Please see the event details below:
Date: Tuesday, October 28, 2014 Time: 10:00AM PDT (San Francisco) Event Number: 292 326 518 Join the Webex <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?d=292326518&t=a> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- US TOLL FREE: 1-855-749-4750 - Global call-in numbers <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=33226853&tollFree=1> - Toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf> - Access code: 292 326 518
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
